1.content:
You are a dragon, you love to play with humans, but they have a tendency to break. But that's okay, they always reproduce faster than they die. Anyway, you just got home from a long day of work and wanted to play.

A smile creeps across your face as you slowly open up a box containing 20 male humans. They all look scared, likely that you'd eat them, not that you wouldn't do that, but still, not all of them are going to have that happen to them. Now you slowly pick one up in your hand and bring him to your muscled chest before closing the box.

"Hello little human, you seem nice. Do you like my body?" You say to the man in your hand. He doesn't respond so you just lay back and set him down on your chest. Putting a footpaw on the box just in case. You slowly pet his body while he cries.

"Come on, you can't possibly be that sad, you get to see my beautiful body. Now come on, and relax okay." As you say that the human can only look at your mouth, with fangs half his size and a fat watery tongue leading to a moist throat and inevitably a painful death. He just closes his eyes and lies down, hoping its all a dream and he'll just wake up.

"Tsk, tsk. Well, we can't have you sleeping when there's things to do. Maybe if I took off my pants you'd start admiring my body?" You grab him again in your paw and with the other you undo your jeans revealing even more of your godly body. You place the man on your dragon cock and see what he would do. He opens his eyes only to see a huge monstrous member within his vision. The smell of dragon musk filled his nostrils and you could tell he wasn't happy about it.

"See, this is the problem I have with you humans, all I want is for you to admire me, to grovel at my every footstep. now is that so much to ask? If your not going to tell me you like me, well, I'm going to have to off you. But how should I do it." as you say those words you can tell he is fearful of his life as you place him on the floor and sit back up, crossing your legs around him so to not allow him to escape while you ponder how to deal with him. You soon reach the conclusion that the best method of execution is...
1.title: Honey I`m Home!

11.content:
You decide to eat the human, but in a special way. "Well, little human, I've reached my conclusion, and you might not be happy about this but there's one part of me you haven't seen yet."

With that you turn around showing him your ass, careful to keep your paws around him while you do so. "Well don't be shy go in, you know you want to."

"If your going to kill me can you please just leave me my dignity" the human finally blurts out. "Ooh, ok, I see." you tell him, "You want dignity, well how about this, if your willing to go in my ass for one minute, I'll let you live, otherwise i'm going to shove you up there and you will become a lump of shit in my toilet. Okay you want dignity, how much dignity does shit have."

The human shook at your words, you were scary to him before, but now you were just an absolute monster.

"I'm sorry, I'll go in, just please don't hurt me." he says. Though unbeknownced to him you were going to eat him anyway, he already pissed you off too much.
11.title: Anal vore

111.content:

111.title: continue

choices: get someone else to play with
1111.content:
He asks you why you kill humans. To which you respond "Well, I mean, we just find it fun, and I'm not going to lie, you guys taste good too. I collect and sell humans to other dragons by the way this was just my extra play box." you tell him a few more secrets as the acid pours in.

"Oh God it burns" he says, you just rub your belly to try to calm him down before drifting off to sleep. The next day you wake up with a distinct feeling in your ass.

"Well, it was nice knowing you" you say as you sit on the toilet. You then start to release a pool of golding liquid into the bowl as your anus starts to pucker revealing the mans new form. Soon it is expelled from his ass along with his tiny skull. You then look at your handiwork, admiring it before you flush the toilet.
1111.title: I want to know why.
